meanings.definition: Relating to a particular subject, art, or craft
meanings.sent1: The artist's work was praised for its technical skill and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: She received training in the technical aspects of painting and drawing.
meanings.sent3: The technical precision of the chef's knife skills amazed everyone in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her technical expertise in photography made her stand out among other artists.
meanings.sent5: The technical intricacies of the dance routine required hours of practice to perfect.

meanings.definition: Involving or concerned with applied and industrial sciences
meanings.sent1: The technical advancements in robotics have revolutionized manufacturing processes.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a team of technical experts to improve their production efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The technical wizardry of the engineers made the project seem like magic.
meanings.sent4: His technical knowledge of computer programming was unmatched in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The technical challenges of space exploration require innovative solutions.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the practical application of knowledge
meanings.sent1: The technical skills he learned in school helped him succeed in his job.
meanings.sent2: She attended a technical workshop to enhance her understanding of the subject.
meanings.sent3: The technical know-how of the team ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent4: His technical approach to problem-solving always yielded effective results.
meanings.sent5: The technical expertise of the doctor saved many lives during the crisis.
